title: The Quantum Enigma
synopsis: A brilliant physicist discovers a way to peek into alternate realities and must decide which future to save.

title: Midnight Sonata
synopsis: A gifted pianist reunites a broken family through music and memory.

title: Nebula Rangers
synopsis: An unlikely crew of explorers races to stop a cosmic storm from wiping out inhabited worlds.

title: Skyfire Odyssey
synopsis: A daring pilot leads a rescue mission through turbulent storms to prevent a runaway satellite from crashing to earth.

title: Harbour Lights After Dark
synopsis: A night-time security officer uncovers a conspiracy beneath the glimmering skyline of Sydney's harbourside.
